column4: ALSA provides no wrapping for the mixer items, meaning that it is whatever the hardware provides.  this is often non-sensical to humans.  sometimes you need to adjust two or even three mixer controls to actually do what you want.
Id adjust 20 if I knew which ones :P
and make sure they're all unmuted (press 'm' so there are no "MM" items below the mixers)
I missed the part where you said what you were trying to do.  record, play sound?
